metadata.synopsis: Patron Grainne Jodhpur, dialogue at Elfsong Tavern. Sepaks about the Flaming Fists.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on S_Elfsong_Patron_005 at Elfsong Tavern.

0.speaker: Grainne Jodhpur
0.text: Yeah, I'll take the metal cops over the flesh-and-blood brutes any day of the month.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

1.speaker: Grainne Jodhpur
1.text: If it were up to me, I'd replace all the Flaming Fists with Steel Watchers. At least the big teapots don't make lewd suggestions when you pass by. They smell better, too.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute
